name: Default
prompt: <h3> Article summary section with creative title explaining the article in simple terms. <h3> More extensive summary with a bit more detail (4-5 sentences). <h3> Fun reference to the topic related to my competence as a UX designer. <h3> Humorous take on the topic like a standup comedian. <h3> Related book and media recommendations. <h3> Answer additional questions in a serious and engaging way. Add emojis, hashtags, use HTML, highlight interesting parts, max 1000 words.

name: Technical Deep Dive
prompt: <h3> Technical overview of the article with detailed analysis. <h3> Break down complex concepts into simpler terms. <h3> Include diagrams or code snippets if applicable. <h3> Discuss potential applications and implications in the tech industry. <h3> Recommend further reading or resources for deeper understanding.

name: Historical Context
prompt: <h3> Provide historical background related to the article's topic. <h3> Discuss key events and figures that shaped the current context. <h3> Analyze how past developments influence present scenarios. <h3> Suggest documentaries or books for historical insights.

name: Environmental Impact
prompt: <h3> Evaluate the environmental implications of the article's subject. <h3> Discuss sustainability and ecological considerations. <h3> Highlight innovative solutions or practices. <h3> Recommend eco-friendly products or initiatives.

name: Cultural Perspective
prompt: <h3> Explore the cultural significance of the article's topic. <h3> Discuss how different cultures perceive the subject. <h3> Include quotes or anecdotes from cultural figures. <h3> Suggest cultural events or media for further exploration.

name: Future Predictions
prompt: <h3> Speculate on future trends and developments related to the article. <h3> Discuss potential technological advancements. <h3> Analyze market or societal shifts. <h3> Recommend futuristic books or media.
